content: this is my navel orange crochet pattern this pattern comes with both us and uk crochet versions only the uk version is free all my patterns are written in english the finished size is about 5cm 2in tall though this will change depending on how tight you crochet and what hook is used i recommend using a 3 5mm e/4 size hook with dk weight yarn **skill level ** beginner - basic knowledge required **you need to know the following stitches to make this pattern ** - chain chain - single_crochet single_crochet uk double_crochet - increase increase - decrease decrease **materials required ** orange dk yarn - about 7g green dk yarn - about 1g toy stuffing do not redistribute sell or claim this pattern whole or in part as your own you may sell finished items handmade by you in limited quantities but you must credit myqueergifts as the designer this pattern will be available as a pdf for download instantly after your payment
